Brooklyn Historical Society
Collection of miscellaneous slides of Brooklyn V1991.105
0.03 Linear Feet ten items housed in one box.
circa 1900 to 1980 The Collection of miscellaneous slides of Brooklyn contains both black-and-white and color slides depicting various buildings and locations in Brooklyn, dating from circa 1900 to 1980. Exterior and detail views of the Brooklyn Historical Society (formerly the Long Island Historical Society) building are represented in the collection. Slides by Accession 3 6 V1991.105.1-10
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date (if known); Collection of miscellaneous slides of Brooklyn, V1991.105, Folder number, Object ID number; Brooklyn Public Library, Center for Brooklyn History.
Other Finding Aids
Item level description and digital versions of images from the collection are available for searching via the image database in the library. Please consult library staff for more information.
Processing Information
Fully processed to the item level.
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Source and date of acquisition for this collection are unknown. The collection was formally accessioned in 1991.
Conditions Governing Use
While many items at the Center for Brooklyn History are unrestricted, we do not own reproduction rights to all materials. Be aware of the several kinds of rights that might apply: copyright, licensing and trademarks. The researcher assumes all responsibility for copyright questions.
Conditions Governing Access
Open to researchers without restriction.
Scope and Contents
The Collection of miscellaneous slides of Brooklyn contains both black-and-white and color slides depicting various buildings and locations in Brooklyn, dating from circa 1900 to 1980. Exterior and detail views of the Brooklyn Historical Society (formerly the Long Island Historical Society) building are represented in the collection.
